ComicInfo.Title: Snake in the Grass Part 2
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Snake in the Grass Part 2: Dawn steals Morning Light from the museum where Storm Shadow left it. Cutter and Deep Six discover a B.A.T. factory beneath Broca Beach. Bombstrike escapes her prison. Duke, Roadblock and Mainframe undertake an unauthorized mission into Benzheen to find Claire. Claire goes to see Faoud, unaware someone has been monitoring her movements and preparing to launch a missile strike at her location.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-07 21:26:29. [CVDB545970] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:35:54. [Issue ID 1618629]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jagdish Kumar,James Brown (J. Brown),John Rauch,John Royale,S.L. Gallant
ComicInfo.Characters: Alpine,Lady Jaye,Cobra [B.A.T.S.],Dawn Moreno,Torpedo,Roadblock,Hawk,Farik,Jane,Duke,Anouk,Cutter,Claire Hauser,G.I. Joe [Bombstrike,Red Shadows,Polly,Faoud,Dial-Tone,Mainframe],Psyche-Out,Deep Six,Lt. Falcon,Shipwreck
